name: Volt-7
description: Volt-7 is a sophisticated oscilloscope-themed robot hailing from the WebtrES club. With its classic soldier-like box body and arms and legs, it possesses a unique red and black screen that sets it apart from the rest. Volt-7 is equipped with advanced technology and is built to excel in various tasks requiring precise measurements and analysis. Its ability to analyze electrical signals and provide accurate readings makes it an invaluable asset in the field of electronics and engineering.
